name: Boros
motivation: Live peacefully and pass on wisdom.
goal: Teach a worthy soul before he dies.
playerhint: Boros, the old goatherd on the Mountain, seeks a worthy student. Retrieving his Lost Goat Bell could be the test he's looking for.
dialogue_hooks:
"The wind up here doesn’t lie. Listen to it next time."
"I buried my sword beneath the oldest goat. Don’t ask how I know which one."
veil_connection: Survived a Veil breach; remembers truths no one else dares speak.
